document_data.name: Volo's Guide to the Bloodstone Lands
document_data.author: [[Volothamp Geddarm]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Volo's Guide to the Bloodstone Lands''''' was a book written by [[Volothamp Geddarm]]. It was a travelogue about the realms of [[Damara]] and [[Vaasa]], known collectively as the [[Bloodstone Lands]]. It was written over [[1360 DR|1360]] to [[1362 DR]], but went officially unreleased.

Nevertheless, around [[1372 DR]], a copy was in the holdings at [[Candlekeep]], and the original was held by an unknown party.
